integration
***********


Description
===========

Oracle Integration CLI.


Available Commands
==================

* integration-instance

  * change-compartment

  * change-network-endpoint

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * start

  * stop

  * update

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-log-entry

  * list-work-request-logs
